home.short_description: Cresh-UI is a library that contains a set of high-quality components for building rich and interactive user interfaces.
home.installation_description: We recommend using npm, yarn, or pnpm for installation, not only does this make development easier, but it also allows you to take advantage of the rich ecosystem of JavaScript packages and tools.
